Concurrently, GMNA fleet sales rose from 990,000 units in 2022 to 1,185,000 units in 2023, representing a rise in fleet sales as a percentage of total vehicle sales from 16.7% to 19.2%. (2) The breakdown of revenue drivers — volume improvements ($8.5B), price increases ($3.2B), and favorable mix ($0.7B) — is entirely omitted in the LLM answer, despite being a critical part of the original answer.
